entry.title: Jamming mitigation call
entry.summary: A call will take place on Monday the 28th at 7 pm UTC to discuss solutions for some recent conversations. The agenda for the call includes an overview of solutions under discussion, reputation (local/tokens), and fees. Clara shared a link to the call which can be accessed at https://meet.jit.si/UnjammingLN. The recent conversations that prompted this call can be found at [1] and [2].
